title: FS:  T206 Southern Leaguers (10 different) - both SGC & PSA - VG / VG+
author: Adam

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Southern Leaguers (10 different) - both SGC & PSA - VG / VG+
posts.post_content:
I currently have the following T206 Southern Leaguers for sale:

1.  T206 Reagan - Piedmont, PSA 3, $95
2.  T206 McCauley - Piedmont, PSA 3, $95
3.  T206 Bay - Piedmont, PSA 3, $105
4.  T206 Manion - Piedmont, PSA 3.5, $105  


5.  T206 White - Piedmont, PSA 3, **SOLD, thanks Dustan**
6.  T206 Westlake - Piedmont, SGC 40, **SOLD, thanks Scott**
7.  T206 Perdue - Old Mill, PSA 3, **SOLD, thanks Marty**
8.  T206 Molesworth - Piedmont, SGC 40, **SOLD, thanks Ed**
9.  T206 King - Piedmont - PSA 3, **SOLD, thanks Martin**
10.  T206 Mullaney - Old Mill, PSA 3, **SOLD, thanks Marty**

Shipping with signature confirmation included in all prices.  Front scans of all are below (please email me if you would like backs scans of any, I just did not have room to upload them).     

Paypal fine with no additional surcharge (please send Paypal to [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url]).  

Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any! 

Regards,
Adam
I'll take Perdue and Mullaney.  E-mail sent.  Thanks!

Adam,
